metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1508 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds read flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s io_uring modulein the way a user triggers the io_read() function with some specialparameters. This flaw allows a local user to read some memory out ofbounds.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1508` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
